attributes.action: Let the"Royal British Legion" sponser Englands football team on 11/11/2016
attributes.additional_details: Give RBL have a sponser day for free. Put the logo on the shirts poppy and all.
attributes.background: FIFA wish that no poppies are to be on the national football team of England during their game against Scotland on armistice day. This should be aloud, a nation must show respect to all who have given the greatest sacrifice doing their duty. Never forget!

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for choosing the sponsor of the England football team. This appears to be a matter for the English Football Association.

If you want the government to urge FIFA to overturn its decision, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/170857
